column4: man, if i only knew of a decent g-band wireless card or usb adapter that would work with ubuntu, i would buy the damned thing...... i just have no idea what to buy
you probably not going to find any g cards that work nativly under linux because they all need a close source filmware to be loaded on the chipset to get them to work.
do  you think that could ever change?
or are linux users permanently stuck with slow wireless?
